name: Eversion (itch)
description:
Eversion is a 2D sidescrolling roguelike bullet hell game which also features some RPG, platformer and exploration elements. You play as a newly appointed member of the immune system, in which your job is to protect the body that you're currently residing in, from the virus that's attacking it.

Alll you have to is slay enemies, collect items, and dodge the bullets! Sounds simple right?

Please bare in mind that this is a prototype of what Eversion could be! :D

(also my first time using construct2)
